UB is a premier, research-intensive public university dedicated to academic excellence. UB Thinking, research, creative activity and people positively impact the world. \n \n COMPUTER SCIENCE:The mission of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, State University of New York at Buffalo is to:
1. Perform world-class research in selected areas of computing 2.Provide quality, cutting-edge educational experiences to computing majors at the Bachelor's, Master's, and Ph.D. levels. 3.Provide state-of-the-art education and training in the use of computers to UB students regardless of their major 4.Assist other UB departments in developing faculty computing expertise appropriate to their programs 5.Be a source of computing expertise to UB, Western New York, and New York State.
